nodes.text: Theovor Mindak's wife was the female Human wife of Theovor Mindak, with whom she had a daughter named Samara Mindak. One night, she was taken away from their home by Imperial Intelligence, who never revealed her fate to her family, prompting her husband to despise the Empire and join the Eagle's network.
Theovor Mindak's wife is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Imperial Agent class mission on the planet Dromund Kaas.
